title: Futbol Americas: Riqui Puig the right signing for LA Galaxy?
description:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez react to Riqui Puig's verbal agreement to join LA Galaxy. Is the FC Barcelona man the right signing for Los Angeles? Then the guys discuss Weston McKennie's shoulder injury that will keep him sidelined for the start of the Serie A season. Next we recap the weekend action in MLS. Is DC United's comeback win over Orland City a fluke win or the Wayne Rooney effect? Finally we discuss a pair of struggling Liga MX giants. What is the problem with Guadalajara and Club America?

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez react to Riqui Puig's verbal agreement to join MLS club
